Name: On Your Mark
About the game: On Your Mark is a first-person Magic game for VR. You will be in a strange temple. Faced with monsters from different worlds, you can use different weapons to deal with different monsters. You can also compete with the legendary dragon. Different weapons have different attributes, physical attack, magic type, summon type, different stages of using different weapons will be the only way to defeat monsters, pick up weapons, start fighting! The dragon has five different stages. Mastering the different attacking ways of the Dragon skillfully is an important skill for you to live and defeat him. Only with good reaction ability and perseverance can you win the final victory.
